text:
T. Karikalan, District Collector, on Monday, distributed ‘sankal patra’ under the Systematic Voter Education and Electoral Participation to the students of government schools here. He explained the importance of exercising the franchise and urged them to impress upon their parents and neighbours to vote without fail, fear or favour.

Awareness campaign

R. Baby, Revenue Divisional Officer, on Monday, conducted a special awareness programme at Sarada College for Women for Arts and Science here. She appealed to them to exercise their franchise without fail. human chain was organised for creating awareness among the masses about the goals of election and casting votes.

Short film on voting

A short film on the importance of voting was screened under the auspices of the Information Department at Sir Isaac Newton Women’s College at Pappakovil near here.

Collector at

polling stations

S. Ganesh, District Collector, inspected the polling stations in Thondaimanallur panchayat union near Kulathur on Monday. He ascertained the arrangements for the provision of ramp made for people with disabilities and drinking water supply. He inspected the polling stations at Mandaiyur and Mathur villages.
title: ‘Sankal patra’ reaches govt. schools
